title: Bangladesh Court Orders Arrest Warrant For Ex-Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina
content: A Bangladeshi court on Thursday ordered an arrest warrant for exiled ex-leader Sheikh Hasina, who fled to India in August after she was toppled from power by a student-led revolution.
summary: A Bangladeshi court on Thursday ordered an arrest warrant for exiled ex-leader Sheikh Hasina, who fled to India in August after she was toppled from power by a student-led revolution.

title: "Saying What Was Reported": Trump Stands By Claims Of Immigrants Eating Pets
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Wednesday stood by debunked claims that immigrants in Ohio were eating pets, telling Latino voters during a town hall he was "just saying what was reported."
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Wednesday stood by debunked claims that immigrants in Ohio were eating pets, telling Latino voters during a town hall he was "just saying what was reported."

title: Texas Man With Autism Faces Death Penalty Due To Alleged Child Murder
content: The Texas pardons board rejected a clemency appeal on Wednesday from an autistic man on death row whose murder conviction was based on what his lawyers say was a misdiagnosis of "shaken baby syndrome."
summary: The Texas pardons board rejected a clemency appeal on Wednesday from an autistic man on death row whose murder conviction was based on what his lawyers say was a misdiagnosis of "shaken baby syndrome."

title: In A First, US Uses Advanced B-2 Stealth Bombers Against Houthis In Yemen
content: The United States launched a series of airstrikes on Wednesday evening targeting key underground weapons storage facilities controlled by Iran-backed Houthi rebels in Yemen.
summary: The United States launched a series of airstrikes on Wednesday evening targeting key underground weapons storage facilities controlled by Iran-backed Houthi rebels in Yemen.

title: UN Report Says 1.1 Billion People In Acute Poverty
content: More than one billion people are living in acute poverty across the globe, a UN Development Program report said, with children accounting for over half of those affected.
summary: More than one billion people are living in acute poverty across the globe, a UN Development Program report said, with children accounting for over half of those affected.

title: WHO Urges Israel To Allow Aid Access To Gaza Amid Humanitarian Crisis
content: Amid the chaos, WHO and its partners launched the second round of a polio vaccination campaign on Monday, aiming to immunise over half a million children, Xinhua news agency reported.
summary: Amid the chaos, WHO and its partners launched the second round of a polio vaccination campaign on Monday, aiming to immunise over half a million children, Xinhua news agency reported.

title: Opinion: India-Canada Showdown: When Fiction Is As Important As Facts
content: What has compelled Canada to make public its investigations in the Nijjar assassination case and hold India responsible? Has there been a slight or a breach of trust, intended or otherwise, behind the scenes that a public show is to be put up?
summary: What has compelled Canada to make public its investigations in the Nijjar assassination case and hold India responsible? Has there been a slight or a breach of trust, intended or otherwise, behind the scenes that a public show is to be put up?

title: Menendez Brothers Killed Parents To Avoid Abuse, Relatives Urge Their Release
content: Relatives of Lyle and Erik Menendez on Wednesday pleaded for the release of the long-imprisoned brothers as US prosecutors review new evidence concerning the infamous 1989 murder of their parents.
summary: Relatives of Lyle and Erik Menendez on Wednesday pleaded for the release of the long-imprisoned brothers as US prosecutors review new evidence concerning the infamous 1989 murder of their parents.

title: Why Many Australians Aren't Looking Forward To King Charles' Visit
content: On the eve of King Charles III's landmark tour Down Under, many of his antipodean subjects are unaware or uninterested -- a sign, experts say, of a more diverse and less Anglo-centric Australia.
summary: On the eve of King Charles III's landmark tour Down Under, many of his antipodean subjects are unaware or uninterested -- a sign, experts say, of a more diverse and less Anglo-centric Australia.

title: Vistara Frankfurt-Mumbai Flight Makes Emergency Landing After Bomb Threat
content: A Mumbai-bound Vistara flight with 147 persons on board made an emergency landing here on Wednesday upon its arrival from Frankfurt in Germany following a bomb threat to the aircraft, a source said.
summary: A Mumbai-bound Vistara flight with 147 persons on board made an emergency landing here on Wednesday upon its arrival from Frankfurt in Germany following a bomb threat to the aircraft, a source said.

title: What Are Tar Balls, The Mystery Debris That Is Closing Beaches In Sydney
content: Lifeguards declared Sydney's famed Bondi beach and several other strands closed Thursday, as more mysterious black "tar ball" globules washed up along the city's shores.
summary: Lifeguards declared Sydney's famed Bondi beach and several other strands closed Thursday, as more mysterious black "tar ball" globules washed up along the city's shores.

title: 69-Year-Old Man Killed In Brooklyn Home Fire Caused By E-Scooter Battery
content: A tragic fire in a Brooklyn apartment, caused by a faulty lithium-ion battery in an e-scooter, claimed the life of a 69-year-old man and left two others injured.
summary: A tragic fire in a Brooklyn apartment, caused by a faulty lithium-ion battery in an e-scooter, claimed the life of a 69-year-old man and left two others injured.

title: Israel's Counter Attack On Iran Is Expected Before US Election, Say Officials
content: While Israel's plans for retaliation are not directly tied to the upcoming election, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is reportedly aware of the potential impact on American politics.Â
summary: While Israel's plans for retaliation are not directly tied to the upcoming election, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is reportedly aware of the potential impact on American politics.

title: Did You Know, Dolphins Are Exhaling Microplastic Fibers?
content: The study found the microplastic particles exhaled by bottlenose dolphins (Tursiops truncatus) are similar in chemical composition to those identified in human lungs.
summary: The study found the microplastic particles exhaled by bottlenose dolphins (Tursiops truncatus) are similar in chemical composition to those identified in human lungs.

title: What Produces 1:1 Sex Ratio In Humans? A New Genetic Study Looks For Clues
content: A new paper searches huge human data sets for gene variants that throw the 1:1 sex ratio off balance, and test the biological and theoretical rules of sex ratio.
summary: A new paper searches huge human data sets for gene variants that throw the 1:1 sex ratio off balance, and test the biological and theoretical rules of sex ratio.

title: Swiss-Indian Billionaire's Daughter Detained In Uganda, He Moves UN
content: Swiss industrialist Pankaj Oswal filed an appeal with the United Nations against the alleged illegal detention of his 26-year-old daughter in Uganda.
summary: Swiss industrialist Pankaj Oswal filed an appeal with the United Nations against the alleged illegal detention of his 26-year-old daughter in Uganda.

title: Justin Trudeau's Big Admission Amid India-Canada Diplomatic Showdown
content: In a startling admission during a public inquiry, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau admitted that Canada had no "hard evidentiary proof" to support allegations linking Indian government agents to the killing of  Hardeep Singh Nijjar.
summary: In a startling admission during a public inquiry, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau admitted that Canada had no "hard evidentiary proof" to support allegations linking Indian government agents to the killing of  Hardeep Singh Nijjar.

title: North Korean Hackers Steal $3 Billion In Crypto To Fund Nuclear Programme
content: North Korean hackers have stolen an estimated $3 billion worth of cryptocurrency since 2017, using the funds to support the regime's nuclear and missile programmes, a Microsoft report showed on Thursday.
summary: North Korean hackers have stolen an estimated $3 billion worth of cryptocurrency since 2017, using the funds to support the regime's nuclear and missile programmes, a Microsoft report showed on Thursday.

title: Meta Lays Off Employees Across Units, At WhatsApp And Instagram: Report Meta layoffs
content: Meta is laying off employees across units including Instagram, WhatsApp and Reality Labs, the Verge reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.
summary: Meta is laying off employees across units including Instagram, WhatsApp and Reality Labs, the Verge reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

title: Stray Dogs Eat Bodies On Gaza Streets As Death Count Mounts To 42,400
content: Israel launched a military campaign in Gaza after Hamas attacked Israeli towns on October 7 last year, resulting in the deaths of 1,206 people, mostly civilians.
summary: Israel launched a military campaign in Gaza after Hamas attacked Israeli towns on October 7 last year, resulting in the deaths of 1,206 people, mostly civilians.
